content:
Check:
  any:
    - name: --TESTCD
      operator: not_matches_regex
      value: ^[A-Z_][A-Z0-9_]{0,7}$
    - name: IETESTCD
      operator: not_matches_regex
      value: ^[A-Z_][A-Z0-9_]{0,7}$
Core:
  Id: CORE-000220
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TESTCD > 8 chars or contains more than only letters,
  numbers and underscores, or starts with a number.
Outcome:
  Message: --TESTCD > 8 chars or contains more than only letters, numbers, underscores,
    or starts with a number.
  Output Variables:
    - --TESTCD
    - IETESTCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0372
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Values of --TESTCD must be limited to 8 characters;
                  and cannot start with a number; nor can they contain characters
                  other than letters; numbers; or underscores
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --TESTCD > 8 chars or contains more than only letters, numbers and underscores, or starts with a number.

Outcome.Message: --TESTCD > 8 chars or contains more than only letters, numbers, underscores, or starts with a number.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Values of --TESTCD must be limited to 8 characters; and cannot start with a number; nor can they contain characters other than letters; numbers; or underscores
